dcterms:description: A public non-contrast CT (NCCT) dataset of acute ischemic stroke (AIS), which includes 345 training scans and 52 testing scans. Ischemic lesions are manually contoured on NCCT by a doctor using MRI scans as the reference standard.
dcterms:title: AISD
